data.description: This determines the pattern that is used to draw the layer that is printed directly onto the build plate. It can be changed separately from other Top/Bottom patterns. Some patterns will adhere to the build plate better than others. You can also use it to get a specific visual effect on the bottom of your print.
data.img_description: This animation shows the initial layer has a concentric pattern, while the remaining layers have a lines pattern.
data.hints:
- This setting only affects the layer that is printed directly on the build plate.
- The concentric pattern tends to adhere better than linear patterns, since the lines do not contract all in one direction.
